WorkItem.Description: If in gear exist more then one upgradable items (http://www.wowhead.com/item=71617#comments) and the player have one Crystallized Firestone will be very pleasant to have possibility to tell Optimizer: I have Crystallized Firestone and Optimizer compute which item after upgrade to heroic version (lvl 378->391) give me the best benefit.

Comments.Message: In the next version you'll have a new menu option to load item costs for Crystallized Firestone. Then you can either use Direct Upgrades Gear/Cost chart or optimizer with Cost <= 1 constraint.
